config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration _transientMode is used to determine whether to use a TransientJournal or a PersistentJournal in the journal() method. If _transientMode is true, a TransientJournal is created, otherwise a PersistentJournal is created.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the _transientMode configuration depends on the value assigned to it and how often the journal() method is called in the system. If _transientMode is frequently set to true or false, the configuration will be triggered accordingly.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the _transientMode configuration option on the system is significant as it determines the type of journal used, which can affect the performance and durability of the system. Using a TransientJournal may provide better performance but less durability compared to a PersistentJournal.
